Name: Landmarks, Fashion Tower, Manhattan (N 260079 HIM).
Title: Application number N 260079 HIM (Fashion Tower) submitted by the Landmarks Preservation Commission pursuant to the provisions of Section 3020 of the Charter of the City of New York and Chapter 3 of Title 25 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, the designation of the Fashion Tower, located at 135 West 36th Street (Block 812, Lot 19), Borough of Manhattan, Community District 5, Council District 3.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions
